name: Quiz Master - Ultimate Test
description:
🧠Test your knowledge on this quiz game.

Earn coins for correct answers and spend them on hints for the most challenging questions. Earn coins for correct quiz answers and spend them on hints for the most hard challenging questions.

Features:

- Stress-relieving quiz game

- Detailed questions for every levels

- Daily Quiz

- Daily Packs feature (different questions)

- Play To Earn (You need to create wallet for this, email us: lanzlutherstudio@gmail.com)

In this quiz you will find interesting questions from the following categories as of now:

-Fruits quiz

-Countries & Places

-Trivia's

-Animals

 Download the quiz game now and start testing your IQ KNOWLEDGE.
